TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHierarchyData

summary.span: 公开分层数据结构的节点，包括节点对象和描述节点特征的一些属性。

span.span: Exposes a node of a hierarchical data structure, including the node object and some properties that describe characteristics of the node.

summary.span: 实现 接口的对象可以包含在 集合中，并由 ASP.NET 站点导航和数据源控件所使用。

span.span: Objects that implement the interface can be contained in collections, and are used by ASP.NET site navigation and data source controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口由表示层次结构节点的类实现, 并跟踪其父节点和子节点的层次结构关系。The interface is implemented by classes that represent nodes of a hierarchical structure, and track the hierarchical relationships to their parent and child nodes. 实现接口的类可以包含在实现接口的集合中。Classes that implement the interface can be contained in collections that implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 包装对象的类实现接口。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface with a class that wraps a object. 类是层次结构数据节点的一个很好的示例, 接口表示该节点的 ASP.NET 分层数据源控件。 The class is a good example of a hierarchical data node, which the interface represents for ASP.NET hierarchical data source controls. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#5)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以递归方式循环访问集合, 使用方法从枚举器提取项, 并使用数据项执行基本操作。The following code example demonstrates how to recursively iterate through an collection, extract the item from the enumerator using the method, and perform basic work with the data item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetChildren() cil managed

summary.span: 获取一个枚举对象，该对象表示当前分层节点的所有子节点。

span.span: Gets an enumeration object that represents all the child nodes of the current hierarchical node.

returns.span: 当前分层节点的子节点的 集合。

span.span: An collection of child nodes of the current hierarchical node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用属性来确定节点是否有子节点。You can use the property to determine whether the node has child nodes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查属性以确定当前分层数据节点是否有子节点, 并使用方法检索它们。The following code example demonstrates how to check the property to determine whether the current hierarchical data node has child nodes, and retrieve them using the method. 此代码示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData GetParent() cil managed

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象表示当前分层节点的父节点。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the parent node of the current hierarchical node.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示当前分层节点的父节点。

span.span: An object that represents the parent node of the current hierarchical node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口未定义 HasParent 方便性属性, 因此调用方必须检查方法`null`的返回值, 以确定当前节点是否为层次结构数据的根节点节点所属的结构。The interface does not define a HasParent convenience property, so callers must check the return value of the method for `null` to determine whether the current node is the root node of the hierarchical data structure to which the node belongs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 实现接口的类中实现方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the interface. 类包装对象, 方法实现检查对象的类型, 并根据类型返回相应的父对象。 `FileSystemHierarchyData`The `FileSystemHierarchyData` class wraps a object, and the method implementation checks the type of the object, and returns the appropriate parent object based on the type. 此代码示例摘自为接口和类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface and the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasChildren As Boolean
public: property bool HasChildren { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指示 对象所表示的分层数据节点是否有子节点。

span.span: Indicates whether the hierarchical data node that the object represents has any child nodes.

value.span: 如果当前节点具有子节点，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current node has child nodes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个便捷属性, 使调用方可以避免检查的方法`null`的返回值。 The property is a convenience property that enables callers to avoid checking the return value of the method for `null`. 如果属性返回`true`, 则调用方法来检索子节点的集合。 If the property returns `true`, call the method to retrieve an collection of child nodes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 ASP.NET 分层数据绑定控件如何使用递归数据绑定方法中的对象。The following code example demonstrates how an ASP.NET hierarchical data-bound control uses an object in a recursive data-binding method. 枚举集合中的项, 并使用方法检索每个对象。The items in an collection are enumerated, and for each an object is retrieved using the method. 最后, 将检查属性以确定是否要进行递归。Finally, the property is checked to determine whether to recurse. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Item { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象所表示的分层数据节点。

span.span: Gets the hierarchical data node that the object represents.

value.span: 一个 分层数据节点对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管许多表示分层数据节点的类 (如类) 可直接实现接口, 但其他类只充当不实现接口的类的包装。While many classes that represent hierarchical data nodes, such as the class, implement the interface directly, other classes only act as a wrapper for a class that does not implement the interface. 如果业务对象在功能上等同于某个对象, 但无法轻松地进行重新设计, 则会为这些设计情况提供属性。The property is provided for these design situations, when business objects are functionally equivalent to an object but cannot be redesigned easily. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性, 使用属性检查对象的类型, 并强制转换对象以执行更多类型特定的操作。The following code example demonstrates how to access properties, check the type of an object using the property, and cast the object to perform more type-specific operations. 此代码示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the hierarchical path of the node.

value.span: 一个 ，标识相对当前节点的分层路径。

span.span: A that identifies the hierarchical path relative to the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将 属性传递给方法, 以检索与标识的节点相对应的对象。 The property can be passed to the method to retrieve the object that corresponds to the node identified by . > [!CAUTION] > 属性不应包含有关主机环境的任何敏感信息, 因为它可能会在数据绑定控件中呈现给客户端。The property should not contain any sensitive information about the host environment, because it might be rendered to the client in a data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 实现接口的类中实现属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the interface. 类包装对象,属性实现返回其文件系统路径。 `FileSystemHierarchyData`The `FileSystemHierarchyData` class wraps a object, and the property implementation returns its file system path. 此代码示例摘自为接口和类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface and the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As String
public: property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含在 属性中的 的类型名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the type of contained in the property.

value.span: 对象表示的对象的类型的名称。

span.span: The name of the type of object that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不返回对象中表示的对象的。 The property does not return the of the object represented in an object. 它将返回数据绑定控件使用的名称, 以区分层次结构中具有不同可绑定属性的项。It returns a name used by data-bound controls to differentiate between items in a hierarchy that have different bindable properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将基本属性写入流, 然后使用属性检查对象的类型, 并强制转换对象以执行更多类型特定的操作。The following code example demonstrates how to write the basic properties to an stream, then check the type of an object using the property and cast the object to perform more type-specific operations. 此代码示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]
